name: Cackle
summary: Your patron’s power fills you with confidence, letting you sustain a magical working even as a quick burst of laughter leaves your lips.

name: Cauldron
summary: You can brew magic in your cauldron, creating useful magical concoctions.

name: Counterspell
summary: When a foe Casts a Spell and you can see its manifestations, you can use your magic to disrupt it.

name: Reach Spell
summary: You can extend your spells’ range.

name: Widen Spell
summary: You manipulate the energy of your spell, causing it to spread out and affect a wider area.

name: Witch's Armaments
summary: Your patron’s power changes your body to ensure you are never defenseless.

name: Wortwitch
summary: You have a particular affinity for leafy plants.

name: Basic Lesson
summary: Your patron grants you a special lesson, revealing a hidden facet of its nature.

name: Cantrip Expansion
summary: Study broadens your range of simple spells.

name: Conceal Spell
summary: Through sheer mental effort, you can simplify the incantations and gestures needed to spellcast, leaving them barely noticeable.

name: Enhanced Familiar
summary: You infuse your familiar with additional primal energy, increasing its abilities.

name: Familiar's Language
summary: You’ve learned to speak with your familiar and other creatures like it.

name: Living Hair
summary: You can instantly grow or shrink your hair, eyebrows, beard, or mustache by up to several feet and manipulate your hair for use as a weapon, though your control isn't fine enough for more dexterous tasks.

name: Eldritch Nails
summary: Your nails are supernaturally long and sharp.

name: Improved Familiar (Witch)
summary: You find it easy to attract a powerful and unusual familiar to your side.

name: Irezoko Tattoo
prerequisite: Expert in Arcana or Expert in Occultism
summary: Your face bears an intricate magical tattoo known as the _irezoko_, a badge of your understanding of your chosen field of magic and a recognition of your advancement within Absalom's College of Mysteries.

name: Rites of Convocation
summary: Your patron grants you the power to summon other creatures to aid you.

name: Sympathetic Strike
summary: You collect your patron’s magic into one of your witch armaments, causing them to shine with runes, light, or another signifier of your patron.

name: Syu Tak-Nwa's Skillful Tresses
summary: You can expertly control your living hair and use it to perform various tasks.

name: Ceremonial Knife
summary: You have prepared a special knife to direct energies when spellcasting.

name: Detonating Spell
summary: Your spell becomes volatile and explosive.

name: Divine Emissary
prerequisite: a familiar, you follow a good-aligned deity or patron
summary: Your familiar is a divine emissary, sent to you by your deity or patron and infused with celestial powers.

name: Greater Lesson
summary: Your patron grants you greater knowledge.

name: Steady Spellcasting
summary: You don’t lose spells easily. If a reaction would disrupt your spellcasting action, attempt a DC 15 flat check. If you succeed, your action isn’t disrupted.

name: Syu Tak-Nwa's Deadly Hair
summary: Your hair deals increased damage and can grapple.

name: Witch's Charge
summary: You forge a magical link with another creature, granting you awareness of that creature’s condition and creating a conduit for spellcasting.

name: Chaotic Spell
summary: Your foe can hardly predict and counter your moves if you yourself have no idea what will happen.

name: Helt's Spelldance
summary: Ranik Helt knows a special technique to hide his spells as part of a performance, and you've learned this technique.

name: Incredible Familiar
summary: Your familiar is imbued with even more magic than other familiars.

name: Murksight
summary: Your vision pierces through non-magical fog, mist, rain, and snow.

name: Spirit Familiar
summary: Your familiar can subsume its body to become pure spirit.

name: Stitched Familiar
summary: Your familiar can shed its material form, becoming a mass of animated magic.

name: Syu Tak-Nwa's Hexed Locks
summary: Your hair attacks gain the reach trait and you can deliver hexes through it.

name: Witch's Bottle
summary: You spend 10 minutes and 1 Focus Point brewing a special potion containing the power of one of your hexes that targets a creature.

name: Witch’s Bottle
summary: You spend 10 minutes and 1 Focus Point brewing a special potion containing the power of one of your hexes that targets a creature.

name: Double, Double
summary: For each temporary oil or potion you brew during your daily preparations, you brew two copies of it.

name: Major Lesson
summary: Your patron grants you even greater secrets.

name: Quickened Casting
summary: If your next action is to cast a cantrip or a spell that is at least 2 ranks lower than the highest-rank spell slot you have, reduce the number of actions to cast it by 1 (minimum 1 action).

name: Temporary Potions
summary: During your daily preparations, you can create a batch of two temporary oils or potions using a formula you know.

name: Witch's Communion
summary: You can keep watch over multiple charges.

name: Familiar's Eyes
summary: You use your familiar's senses as easily as your own.

name: Hex Focus
summary: Your patron’s teachings have allowed you to achieve a deeper focus.

name: Witch’s Broom
summary: A broom is the only steed you need to fly through the night sky.

name: Patron’s Presence
summary: Your patron can direct its attention through your familiar, and its mere presence becomes an ominous weight on the minds of other beings to distract them and blot out their magic.

name: Reflect Spell
summary: When you successfully use Counterspell to counteract a spell that affects targeted creatures or an area, you can turn that spell’s effect back on its caster.

name: Rites of Transfiguration
summary: You can adapt your patron’s power to transform other creatures into forms more befitting their behavior or your whims.

name: Effortless Concentration
summary: You can maintain a spell with hardly a thought.

name: Siphon Power
summary: You draw upon the reservoir of your patron’s magic that resides within your familiar.

name: Hex Wellspring
summary: Focus flows from your patron each time you commune with your familiar.

name: Patron’s Claim
summary: Your patron partially manifests itself through your familiar to claim a foe’s power for its own.

name: Split Hex
summary: You siphon some of the power from an offensive hex you cast to direct it at a second target as well.

name: Demon's Hair
summary: Your hair constantly wriggles and writhes.

name: Hex Master
summary: You embody the link to your patron so completely that you can cast your hexes in rapid succession.

name: Patron's Truth
summary: You have mastered the greatest secrets of your patron’s magic and learned a fundamental truth about your patron, even if their identity still remains a mystery.

name: Witch's Hut
summary: Your home is an animated structure that obeys your commands.
